title: Discord server If you are looking for a team or just a game!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
This is a discord If you are looking for a competitive team, duo, flex or just even for a place to talk!
We can even set up 5v5 custom games if we could get staff or people to organise.
Just a friendly place to talk to other gamers!

https://discord.gg/JQwSV5T

Hope to see you there.{{champion:240}} {{champion:17}} {{summoner:31}}
